attributes.action: Make pharmaceutical company's government run, putting profit into health care.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of health care would drastically drop, if a cap on profit were made in this industry. Jobs would not be lost, as the work would still need to be done! Live would be saved as this would become affordable.
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the British government, to take control of the pharmaceutical industry. Put profits into health care and allow natural products to be tested that other company's won't test, as they can't hold a patent on natural products. Also to put this to United Nations. Saving lives.
